Mukura Victory Sports vs Al-Hilal Club (Omdurman)

Mukura Victory Sports 1-0 Al-Hilal Club (Omdurman)

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:26

Umukino urarangiye

Ikipe ya Mukura VS yari ihagarariye u Rwanda muri CAF Confederation Cup isezerewe mu ijonjora rya gatatu. Ibuze itike yo kujya mu matsinda yegukanywe na Al-Hilal Club (Omdurman) yo muri Sudani ku giteranyo cy'ibitego 3-1 mu mikino yombi.

17:23

Iminota ine y'inyongera

Iminota 90 irangiye Mukura VS yatsinze 1-0 ariko umukino nurangira gutya Al-Hilal Club (Omdurman) irahita ibona itike y'amatsinda kuko yatsinze 3-0 mu mukino ubanza wabereye i Khartoum

17:21

90' Koruneri ya Al-Hilal Club

Mu minota ya nyuma y'umukino ikipe ya Al-Hilal Club itangiye guhererekanya neza. Diarra ateye Koruneri ariko umupira ntiwagera kuri Bashir ngo babone igitego cyo kwishyura

17:17

86' Icyizere cyo gukomeza kiri kuyoyoka ariko Mukura VS iracyagerageza

Umukinnyi wo hagati Munyakazi Yussuf Lule azamukanye umupira hagati ahererekanya neza na Duhayindavyi, agerageza gushota ari kure y'izamu ariko Salim Jamal yitwara neza atabara izamu rye

17:08

74' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Mukura VS

Rutahizamu Onesme Twizerimana afashe umwanya wa Bertrand Iradukunda watsinze igitego ariko ubu yagaragazaga umunaniro

17:05

72' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Al-Hilal Club (Omdurman)

Myugariro Mohamed Osman afashe umwanya wa Sharaf Eldin usanzwe ukina hagati

16:56

63' Kutumvikana ku myanzuro y'umusifuzi uhaye Duhayindavyi ikarita y'umuhondo

GaÃ«l Duhayindavyi akoreye ikosa Musa Eldai binamuhesheje ikarita ya mbere y'umuhondo. Ariko abakinnyi ba Mukura VS bahise bamwereka ko batishimiye imyanzuro ye, banashyamirana n'abakinnyi ba Al-Hilal bemeza ko bari gukinirwa nabi

16:50

56' Gusimbura kwa mbere ku mpande zombi

Umutoza Irad Zaafouri wa Al-Hilal Club (Omdurman) akuyemo Geovane Diniz Silva watsinze igitego mu mukino ubanza, asumbuzwa kabuhariwe Muhamed Ahmed Bashir watsinze igitego cya gatatu mu mukino ubanza usanzwe ari kapiteni w'ikipe y'igihugu ya Sudani.

Ku rundi ruhande Mukura VS nayo irasimbuje, Mutebi Rashid wavunitse asimbuwe na Lomami Frank

16:41

48' Abafana ba Mukura VS bikanze Penaliti ariko umusifuzi yemeza ko nta kosa

Ciza Hussein Mugabo azamukanye umupira ku ruhande rw'ibumoso agerageje guhindura umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina ukora ku kaboko ka Emmanuel Chukwu ariko umusifuzi ntiyemeza penaliti ya Mukura VS ntibyishimirwa n'abakinnyi bayo

16:36

Igice cya kabiri cy'umukino kiratangiye

Akabeho gakomeje kwiyongera mu Mujyi wa Huye ahari kubera umukino wo kwishyura wa CAF Confederation Cup. Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

16:20

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Ikipe ya Mukura VS irasabwa gushaka ibitego bibiri mu gice cya kabiri kuko irangije icya mbere iyoboye umukino n'igitego 1-0 cyatsinzwe na Iradukunda Bertrand

16:18

Iminota ibiri y'inyongera ku gice cya mbere

Icyizere ku bakunzi ba Mukura VS gikomeje kwiyongera kuko ikipe yabo irangije iminota 45 iyoboye umukino. Umusifuzi wa kane amanitse iminota ibiri y'inyongera

16:13

45' Mutebi Rashid ahushije igitego cyagombaga kuba icya kabiri cya MVS

Ikipe ya Mukura VS ikomeje gusatira ishaka kwishyura ibitego yatsinzwe. Iradukunda Bertrand uri kugora cyane ba myugariro ba Hilal acomekeye umupira mwiza rutahizamu Mutebi Rashid ariko ateye mu izamu Salim Jamal ahagarara neza akuramo uyu mupira

16:10

42' Impinduka mu izamu zafashije Mukura VS

Umutoza Haringingo Francis yakoze impinduka abanza mu kibuga Wilonja Ismail yicaza Rwabugiri Omar utaritwaye neza mu mukino ubanza. Byatumye usanzwe ari umunyezamu wa kabiri Ingabire Aimee Regis we atajya no ku rutonde rw'abalinnyi 18 bakoreshejwe. Uyu munyezamu usanzwe ari uwa kabiri atabaye Mukura akuramo umupira wari uzamukanywe na Idris Mbambo ukomoka muri Congo Brazaville

16:02

30' IGITEGO CYA MBERE CYA MUKURA VS

Ciza Hussein Mugabo uri kwitwara neza azamukanye umupira ku ruhande rw'ibumoso ahindura umupira wihuta usanga Iradukunda Bertrand imbere y'izamu atsindisha umutwe umupira usanze umunyezamu Salim Jamal adahagaze neza, awutora mu rushundura

15:57

23' Christopher Ndayishimiye agize ikibazo cy'imvune

Rutahizamu Ndayishimiye Christopher agonganye na Diarra ukina hagati mu kibuga none agize ikibazo cy'imvune mu ivi. Ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga

15:52

19' Coup Franc ya Mukura VS ntabwo ikanze Salim Jamal

Abakinnyi ba Mukura VS ntabwo bava ku izamu rya Al Hilal. Habonetse coup franc ku ikosa rikorewe Duhayindavyi, itewe na kapiteni Ciza Hussein ariko umunyezamu Salim Jamal Magoola akuramo umupira bitamugoye

15:47

14' Mukura VS ikomeje gushaka igitego ariko ntabwo irahirwa

Ciza Hussein Mugabo ukina inyuma ya ba rutahizamu ahawe umupira na Lule atera ishoti ari hanze y'urubuga rw'amahina ariko umupira uca hejuru y'izamu gato.

15:44

11' Al-Hilal ihushije uburyo bwabazwe

Rutahizamu Nasr Eldin acanze Rugirayabo Hassan atera ishoti rikomeye mu izamu ariko ntiwamukundira uca iruhande rw'izamu rya Wilonja Ismail urindira Mukura VS gato

15:41

07' Koruneri ya mbere y'umukino

Munyakazi Yussuf Lule azamukanye umupira hagati mu kibuga acomekera Ndayishimiye Christopher agerageje gutungura umunyezamu ariko myugariro Emmanuel Chukwu Aliwa arawurenza. Koruneri ya Mukura VS ntacyo ibyaye

15:39

Umunyezamu wa Al-Hilal Club aje mu Rwanda ku nshuro ya kabiri

Umunyezamu Salim Jamal Magoola uri mu izamu rya Al-Hilal Club asanzwe arindira ikipe ya Uganda Cranes. Ari mu Rwanda ku nshuro ya kabiri nyuma yo kuzana n'ikipe ye y'igihugu y'abatarengeje imyaka 23 muri 2015 aho basezereye Amavubi

15:37

03' Al-Hilal Club itabawe n'IGITI CY'IZAMU

Ikipe ya Mukura VS itangiye isatirama umuvuduko. Rutahizamu ukomoka mu gihugu cy'u Burundi Ndayishimiye Celestin ahawe umupira na Iradukunda Bertrand agerageza gutera mu izamu ririnzwe na Salim Jamal ukomoka muri Uganda ariko umupira ugarurwa n'igiti cy'izamu.

15:34

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi Ahmad Imtehaz Heeralall atangije umukino, Mukura VS itangira isatira

15:28

Abakinnyi b'impande zombi bagarutse mu kibuga baritegura gutangira umukino

Uko amasaha akura, ikirere kiragenda cyijima. Abakinnyi bari kuramukanya mbere yo gutangira uyu mukino ubanziriza icyiciro cy'amatsinda

15:25

Umukino ugiye kuyoborwa nâ€™abasifuzi bakomoka mu Birwa bya Maurice

Umusifuzi wo hagati ni Ahmad Imtehaz Heeralall. Arafatanya na Cauvelet Louis Ralph na Jean Marc Jeff Pithia naho umusifuzi wa kane ni Fabien Heeralall.

15:23

Nk'ibisanzwe abafana ba Kiyovu Sports bashyigikiye Mukura VS


Mu mikino ya CAF Confederation Cup, abafana ba Kiyovu Sports batunguranye bashyigikira ikipe ya Mukura VS, mukeba bamaranye imyaka irenga 50 mu mupira wâ€™amaguru mu Rwanda. Abo bafana ntabwo baciwe intege no kuba nta cyizere cyo kwishyura 3-0 Mukura VS yatsinzwe mu mukino ubanza, baturuka mu Mujyi wa Kigali baza mu karere ka Huye.

15:22

Abagiye kubanza mu kibuga ku ruhande rwa Al-Hilal Club Omdurman

Umunyezamu: Salim Jamal Magola
Ba myugariro: Saed Osman Ismael, Emmanuel Chukwu Aliwa, Meghani Elyas, Abdalah Mamoun
Abakina hagati: Geovane Diniz Silva, Nasr Eldin Muhamed, Boubacar Diarra na Sharaf Eldin.
Ba rutahizamu: Musa Eldai, Idris Mbambo

15:18

Abakinnyi 11 ba Mukura bagiye kubanza mu kibuga

Ba myugariro: David Nshimirimana, Saidi Iragire, Rugirayabo Hassan na Janvier Mutijima

15:15

Abafana si benshi

Kuba icyizere cyo kubona itike yâ€™amatsinda imbere ya Al-Hilal Club Omdurman atari cyinshi, abafana ba Mukura VS bari ku mbehe yayo ntabwo ari benshi gusa ngo ntibyaciye intege abakinnyi bayo nkuko IGIHE yabitangarijwe na Bertrand Iradukunda mbere yo gutangira kwishyushya.


Yagize ati: â€œTurifuza kugaragaza umukino mwiza. Niduhirwa no kubona ibitego turakora amateka. Gusa akazi ni kenshi.â€

15:07

Al-Hilal irasabwa gushimangira intsinzi yabonye mu mukino ubanza

15:07

Iri ryaba ari Iherezo ry'urugendo rwa Mukura VS muri CAF?

IGIHE ibahaye ikaze kuri Stade Huye ahagiye kubera umukino wo kwishyura w'ijonjora rya gatatu ry'irushanwa rihuza amakipe yatwaye ibikombe by'ibihugu iwayo, CAF Confederation Cup. Mukura VS igiye kwakira Al Hilal yo muri Sudani, nibura isabwa kwishyura ibitego 3-0 yatsindiwe i Khartoum mu mukino ubanza.
